Package game.items

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    BuyableItem
    Interface for item that can be bought
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Bottle
    Bottle class that can be used to fill and store unlimited amount of water
    Coin
    Coin object that can be picked up by actors to add into their wallet balance.
    ConsumableItem
    Abstract class representing all the items that can be consumed
    Fire
    A Fire would be dropped upon a Fire Attack that burns anyone for 20 damage.
    FireFlower
    Fire flower
    HealingWater
    Healing water that heals actor
    Key
    A Key would be dropped by Bowser when Bowser is defeated for Mario to interact with Princess Peach
    PowerStar
    Power Star which grants actor INVINCIBLE capability upon consumed INVINCIBLE actors would be healed by 200 HP, walk normally over high grounds Any high grounds being stepped on would be converted to Dirt and Coins would be dropped Actors would also receive no damage when attack and actors would be able to instantly kill enemies if actors didn't miss NOTE: In our implementation, players can't consume another Power Star if player still has INVINCIBLE effect
    PowerWater
    Power water that empowers actors' attacks
    SuperMushroom
    Super Mushroom which grants actor SUPER capability upon consumed SUPER actors' MAX HP would be increased by 50, display character would be changed to M Actors can also jump freely with 100% success rate and no fall damage NOTE: In our implementation, player's can't consume another Super Mushroom if player still has SUPER effect
    Water
    Water that can be consumed and brings magical effects
    Wrench
    Wrench is a weapon item that can be bought from Toad that enables the actor to destroy Koopa's shell.
